en.answer:
No, you cannot.

The effect of Rank-Up-Magic Limited Barian's Force uses the targeted monster as Xyz Material to Special Summon a "Number C" monster from your Extra Deck, with that Special Summon being treated as an Xyz Summon.

Since a monster Special Summoned by Zoodiac Chakanine's effect『cannot be used as material for an Xyz Summon,』you cannot activate Rank-Up-Magic Limited Barian's Force by targeting it.

The same applies to monsters that had the effects of Gnomaterial, CONTAIN!, Libromancer Prevented, Warning Point, or Spellbound applied to it.

~~~

Additionally, in place of Rank-Up-Magic Limited Barian's Force, this applies to the following effects, which cannot target a monster that cannot be used as material for an Xyz Summon:
● Hyper Rank-Up-Magic Utopiforce
● Rank-Up-Magic Zexal Force
● Rank-Up-Magic Cipher Ascension
● The Phantom Knights' Rank-Up-Magic Launch
● Rank-Up-Magic Skip Force
● Rank-Up-Magic Raid Force
● Rank-Up-Magic Raptor's Force
● Rank-Up-Magic Revolution Force
● Rank-Up-Magic Quick Chaos
● Rank-Up-Magic Argent Chaos Force
● Rank-Up-Magic Astral Force
● Rank-Up-Magic Numeron Force
● Rank-Up-Magic Barian's Force
● Exosister Arment
● Bug Signal
● Hieratic Seal of Creation's ①st effect
● Constellar Tellarknights's ②nd effect
● Super Quantal Mech Ship Magnacarrier's ①st effect
● Noble Arms - Excaliburn's ②nd effect
● Shining Draw's 2nd bulleted (●) effect
● Outrigger Extension
● Eternal Galaxy
● Purrelyeap!?'s ①st effect
● Goblin Biker Grand Pileup's ①st effect
● Xyz Revive Splash's ②nd effect
● Resurgam Xyz's ①st effect
● Ghostrick Renovation's ②nd effect
● Zenmaiday's ②nd effect
en.question: I have Special Summoned a "Zoodiac" monster using the effect of Zoodiac Chakanine, and thus『it cannot be used as material for an Xyz Summon.』Can I now activate Rank-Up-Magic Limited Barian's Force by targeting this "Zoodiac" monster?
en.title: If a monster『cannot be used as material for an Xyz Summon,』can I target it with Rank-Up-Magic Limited Barian's Force?

ja.question: 「<<12962>>」の『②：１ターンに１度、このカードのX素材を１つ取り除き、自分の墓地の「十二獣」モンスター１体を対象として発動できる。そのモンスターを特殊召喚する。この効果で特殊召喚したモンスターはこのターン、効果が無効化され、X召喚の素材にできない』効果によって、墓地から特殊召喚した「十二獣」エクシーズモンスターを対象として、「<<10570>>」を発動できますか？
ja.title: 『X召喚の素材にできない』モンスターを対象として「<<10570>>」を発動できますか？
